oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Preparation of functionalised tetraphenylmethane derivatives via the Suzuki-Miyaura cross-coupling reaction
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
BEHERA, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: aromatic-compounds
organic-synthesis
dendrimers
design
hexaiodobenzene
nanoparticles
construction
aggregation
iodination
chemistry
suzukimiyaura coupling
carbon-rich compounds
palladium
nanostructures
boron
tetraphenylmethane
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A general methodology for the synthesis of various symmetrical and unsymmetrical tetraphenylmethane (TPM) derivatives is reported using the Suzuki-Miyaura (SM) crosscoupling reaction as a key step. The formation of an interesting self-coupling product 14 during the SM cross-coupling reaction of mono-iodo tetraphenylmethane derivative 5 is also observed.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY, 45(12), 2684-2689
